TopicTitle: What if there was a Confetti Launcher?!

Articles.Content:
If I knew how to make models and mod things I would do this on my own but since I don't I'm turning to you guys for help

I was talking to a friend and he thought it would be kinda cool if you could have confetti launchers in game, we were thinking sepratron sized, that would just launch a small shower of multi-colored confetti and be done. You could hot key them so when you land *pop* shower of confetti with the party horn sound effect. Just a thought, I have no idea how hard it would be to make that part but if someone wants to give it a go please have at it and keep me in the loop!

Fly safe and Godspeed!

SovereignWinter
